allow:
Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\)
from main import app
print\(''App loaded successfully''\)
")

Bash(timeout 10s ./venv/Scripts/python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\)
try:
    from src.main import app
    print\(''SUCCESS: App loaded without import errors''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''ERROR: {e}''\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)
")
Bash(pip install fastapi sqlmodel python-jose[cryptography] passlib[bcrypt] python-multipart uvicorn psycopg2-binary alembic pydantic-settings python-dotenv)
